mapper.select:
SELECT PO_NO, PO_CODE, CLT_CODE, EMP_NO, MTL_CODE, MTL_RCV_QTY, MTL_RCV_PRICE, MTL_RCV_DATE, PO_DATE, PO_QTY, QTY_UNIT, WHS_CODE, PO_STATUS, PO_USE_YN FROM PURCHASES_ORDER p WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MATERIAL_RECEIPT m WHERE m.PO_CODE = p.PO_CODE )
ORDER BY PO_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATERIAL_RECEIPT ( RECEIPT_NO, RECEIPT_CODE, PO_CODE, MTL_CODE, RECEIVED_QTY, LOT_NO, RECEIPT_DATE, RECEIPT_STATUS, WAREHOUSE_CODE, LOCATION_CODE, RECEIVER, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MATERIAL_RECEIPT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{receiptCode}, #{poCode}, #{mtlCode}, #{receivedQty}, #{lotNo}, #{receiptDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{receiptStatus}, #{warehouseCode}, #{locationCode}, #{receiver}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdDate}, #{updatedDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT MR.RECEIPT_NO, MR.RECEIPT_CODE, MR.PO_CODE, MR.MTL_CODE, MR.RECEIVED_QTY, MR.LOT_NO, M.MTL_NAME, MR.RECEIPT_DATE, MR.RECEIPT_STATUS, MR.WAREHOUSE_CODE, MR.LOCATION_CODE, MR.RECEIVER, MR.CREATED_BY, MR.UPDATED_BY, MR.CREATED_DATE, MR.UPDATED_DATE FROM MATERIAL_RECEIPT MR LEFT JOIN MATERIALS M ON MR.MTL_CODE = M.MTL_CODE
